title: I got elo boosted
body: So recently like 2-3 weeks ago me Itommi purchased an elo boost from gold 2 to plat 4 someone played on my account as Vladimir and achieved this. Now they won’t leave me alone asking if I want another and crap I had to block several of the accounts. Help

replies.body: Looks like someone didnt pay their booster.
in all honesty, this could be the booster getting the account banned because they didn't get paid
Yeah man. Bet timethief really appreciates you mansplaining.

> [{quoted}](name=Zed genius,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YI6hkt5V,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-09-25T12:24:34.008+0000)
>
> in all honesty, this could be the booster getting the account banned because they didn't get paid

Yeah, thats what i wrote.
i thought you meant that the booster is doing what OP said because they didn't get paid, I get it now
Can we have this guy banned? I mean he literally out right said he elo boosted....

Sounds like some serious harrassment. You better submit a ticket to support and explain what is going on. Make sure they understand why this player is messsging you. It is imperative they know you used his services already.
Whats next? Asking the police for help because someone stole your meth?

so not only are you part of the problem, but you're too ignorant to know that it breaks the ToS as well?

sad man...really sad
This is too stupid to be real, right?

I wish these losers had enough money to buy elo boost to masters. Plat is filled with boosted noobs that are happy being deadweight and having to get carried 50% of their wins and lose 50% of their other games.
Wait.....I can make money boosting people? Wow....Any hardstuck Bronzie wants a boost to Gold? Hit me up. I'll be reasonable with my prices.
I don’t know what to say
Finally someone addresses the real problem of league.
